newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-IAMA makes 9-10 bid for Primac.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-IAMA makes 9-10 bid for Primac.

text.p: IAMA Ltd said on Friday it had made a takeover bid for Brisbane-based Primac Holdings Ltd consisting of nine IAMA shares for every 10 Primac shares.
IAMA shares ended two cents higher on Friday at A$2.82 while Primac was unchanged at A$3.10, its year high.
Primac has 16.96 million shares on issue and a market capitalisation on A$52.57 million.
IAMA said in a substantial shareholder notice on Friday that it held 16.81 percent of Primac, a pastoral company.
Primac said on Septemer 9 that its 1995/96 net profit rose to A$4.31 million from A$3.04 million a year earlier.
It had sales of A$200.61 million compared with A$180.68 million in 1994/95. IAMA is a rural merchandise group which listed in early 1994. -- Sydney Newsroom 61-2 9373-1800
